author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
"It would have been Grant Imahara's birthday on Thursday, Oct 23. Could you please share any stories about Grant’s early days on MythBusters?" In this live stream excerpt Adam answers this question from Tested member Lee Marsh, and shows some images from his first digital camera. Thank you for your support, Lee! What was your first digital camera?

title: Happy Birthday, Grant Imahara
